survey_name: Gen Z Workplace Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and satisfaction levels of Gen Z employees regarding digital collaboration tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How often do you use digital collaboration tools (e.g., Slack, Microsoft Teams, Zoom) for work?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for clarity. Mobile-friendly design recommended.

script.question_text: How often do you use digital collaboration tools (e.g., Slack, Microsoft Teams, Zoom) for work?

questions.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you currently use at work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format. Include an 'Other' option for open-ended responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include a text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you currently use at work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in digital collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format. Include an 'Other' option for open-ended responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include a text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in digital collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale for clarity. Mobile-friendly design recommended.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using digital collaboration tools at work?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using digital collaboration tools at work?

questions.question_text: Would you prefer more training on how to use digital collaboration tools effectively?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity.

script.question_text: Would you prefer more training on how to use digital collaboration tools effectively?
